author: Azeoo
notes: This month was the worst. I lost 8 or 9 KoG Rank Ups and tilted back to L2 5-6 times. Every time with Sylvans or CA. 5th game in L3 was weird every time i couldnt win it ..... today i lost my 5th game again. i was so mad i nearly destroyed my keyboard, mouse and more. i netdecked this burn deck and went 5-0 ... i dont want to play pvp anymore, this game suck
